nodes.text: Garnib Station was the only Imperial military base on the arctic planet of Garnib, located within the Outer Rim Territories. The Human Verus Carbinol was designated governor of Garnib, which proved to be a dead-end job, since the native Balinaka opposed no resistance to the Imperial occupation. The base itself hosted a modest three battalions, and was located next to the governor's 47-room mansion on the coast of the ocean.
